pr_title: DPC-1027: Add Public Key operations to CLI

timeline.message:
DPC-1027: Refactor admin operations

Created new public key admin endpoints and split them off from the previously existing token operations.

Also refactored some of the common parameter extraction logic.

DPC-1027: Create CLI operations for managing public keys

Added upload, delete and list command for organization public keys.

timeline.message:
DPC-1027: Add test class for public key admin tasks

Mocking the key resource to ensure the admin tasks are covered.

DPC-1027: Added unit tests for client token tests

Added unit tests for the admin tasks, to ensure that they edge cases are covered. Nice to have good code coverage numbers and address some tech debt.

timeline.message:
DPC-1027: Actually register CLI commands.

Register the key subcommands and the root command with the API service.

timeline.bodyText: Should this say something more like, ID of organization to upload key for?
timeline.author: em1

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/dpc-api/src/main/java/gov/cms/dpc/api/cli/keys/KeyUpload.java b/dpc-api/src/main/java/gov/cms/dpc/api/cli/keys/KeyUpload.java
index a6493d7f..2a9092fa 100644
--- a/dpc-api/src/main/java/gov/cms/dpc/api/cli/keys/KeyUpload.java
+++ b/dpc-api/src/main/java/gov/cms/dpc/api/cli/keys/KeyUpload.java

@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ public class KeyUpload extends AbstractAdminCommand {
                 .addArgument("id")
                 .required(true)
                 .dest("org-reference")
-                .help("ID of Organization to list tokens");
+                .help("ID of Organization to upload keys tokens");
 
         subparser
                 .addArgument("--label", "-l")

timeline.author: em1
